title: Autonomous Strategy Development Iteration State
description: Persistent state for autonomous QuantConnect strategy development workflow

current_hypothesis.name: Statistical Arbitrage Pairs Trading
current_hypothesis.description: Market-neutral pairs trading across 4 diverse pairs with Z-score based entry/exit and dollar-neutral positioning
current_hypothesis.rationale: Based on CLAUDE0 backtest showing strong risk-adjusted returns (Sharpe 4.45, Win Rate 77%, Max DD 7.13%, CAGR 14.73%). Strategy exploits mean-reverting relationships in correlated financial instruments using statistical arbitrage across diverse sectors (banking, energy, infrastructure).

backtest_results.reason: Strong baseline performance (Sharpe 1.81, Max DD 8.3%, 329 trades, 61.7% win rate, PSR 99.15%). Meets production-ready criteria - can skip optimization and proceed directly to out-of-sample validation.
